mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ITEM_ID) FROM ITEMS I JOIN ITEM_TAGS T ON I.ITEM_ID = T.ITEM_ID WHERE T.TAG = #{tag}
SELECT I.ITEM_ID, I.LABEL, I.PRICE, I."DESC", II.PATH FROM ITEMS I JOIN ITEM_IMAGES II ON I.ITEM_ID = II.ITEM_ID AND II.CATEGORY = 'thumbnail' WHERE I.ITEM_ID = #{item_id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT I.ITEM_ID, I.LABEL, I.PRICE, II.PATH, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY I.REG_DATE) AS RN FROM ITEMS I JOIN ITEM_TAGS IT ON I.ITEM_ID = IT.ITEM_ID JOIN ITEM_IMAGES II ON I.ITEM_ID = II.ITEM_ID AND II.CATEGORY = 'thumbnail' WHERE IT.TAG = #{tag} ORDER BY I.REG_DATE) WHERE RN BETWEEN 0 AND #{limit}

SELECT LABEL, "DESC", CATEGORY, STOCK, PRICE FROM ( SELECT I.LABEL, I."DESC", II.PATH, I.CATEGORY, I.STOCK, I.PRICE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ORDER_COUNT DESC) AS RN FROM ITEMS I JOIN (SELECT ITEM_ID, SUM(AMOUNT) AS ORDER_COUNT FROM ORDERS GROUP BY ITEM_ID) M ON I.ITEM_ID = M.ITEM_ID JOIN ITEM_IMAGES II ON I.ITEM_ID = II.ITEM_ID AND II.CATEGORY = 'thumbnail' ) WHERE RN BETWEEN 0 AND #{limit}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT I.ITEM_ID, I.LABEL, I.PRICE, II.PATH, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY I.REG_DATE DESC) AS RN FROM ITEMS I JOIN ITEM_IMAGES II ON I.ITEM_ID = II.ITEM_ID AND II.CATEGORY = 'thumbnail') WHERE RN BETWEEN 0 AND #{limit}
